author: Philip Bromwell
title: Dublin nurse with Covid-19 urges people to stay at home
description: A 23-year-old nurse from Dublin who is being treated for Covid-19 is urging people to maintain social distancing and follow the advice to stay at home.
content:
A 23-year-old nurse from Dublin who is being treated for Covid-19 is urging people to maintain social distancing and follow the advice to stay at home.
Emma Biggar, who has a pre-existing medical condition, was admitted to St Vincent's University Hospital in… [+1190 chars]
